SELECT pp.date_mark AS "time",
       CONCAT_WS(' - ', ps.title, p.title),
       pp.price
FROM mod_products_prices AS pp
    JOIN mod_products AS p ON pp.product_id = p.id
    JOIN mod_products_shops AS ps ON pp.shop_id = ps.id
WHERE (p.title LIKE '%Лук репчаты%' OR
       p.title LIKE '%Лук порей%')
  AND p.category IN ('Лук, чеснок', 'Лук')
  AND FIND_IN_SET(ps.title, '${shop:csv}')
  AND $__timeFilter(pp.date_mark)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(pp.date_mark, '%Y-%m-%d'),
         p.title
ORDER BY pp.date_mark;

SELECT pp.date_mark AS "time",
       CONCAT_WS(' - ', ps.title, p.title),
       pp.price
FROM mod_products_prices AS pp
    JOIN mod_products AS p ON pp.product_id = p.id
    JOIN mod_products_shops AS ps ON pp.shop_id = ps.id
WHERE p.title LIKE '%Картофель%'
  AND p.category = 'Картофель'
  AND $__timeFilter(pp.date_mark)
  AND FIND_IN_SET(ps.title, '${shop:csv}')

         p.title
ORDER BY pp.date_mark;

   JOIN mod_products_shops AS ps ON pp.shop_id = ps.id
WHERE p.category IN ('Стиральные порошки')
  AND pp.unit = 'кг'
  AND pp.quantity >= 7
  
  AND FIND_IN_SET(ps.title, '${shop:csv}')
  AND $__timeFilter(pp.date_mark)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(pp.date_mark, '%Y-%m-%d'),
         p.title
ORDER BY pp.date_mark;

       CONCAT_WS(' - ', ps.title, p.title),
